Name: St Peters Public Library, Local Studies Collection

About.Hours & facilities: Library open Mon, Thurs and Fri 10.30am-6pm , Tues 10:30am-9pm, Sat 9:30am-12pm, Sun 2-5pm; Local History Officer available Tues 1-5pm and Fri 10:30-1:30pm; closed Wed and public holidays. General reference assistance and copying services available.

About.Acquisition focus: Material relating to all aspects of the development of the St Peters council area from pre-European settlement to the present day.
